params.expiration_blocks: Tokens can only be claimed before this time
params.receivers: Addresses to which the amounts are transferred
params.senders: Addresses from which the amounts are transferred
params.signatures: Sender's signatures concatenated into a single bytes array

params.expiration_block: Tokens can only be claimed before this time
params.receiver: Address to which the amount is transferred
params.sender: Address from which the amount is transferred
params.signature: Sender's signature over keccak256(sender, receiver, amount, expiration_block)

params.contract_address: The address to check whether a contract is deployed or not

returns._0: True if a contract exists, false otherwise

bulkClaim(address[],address[],uint256[],.notice: Submit multiple IOUs to claim the owed amount. This is the same as calling `claim` multiple times, except for the reduced gas cost.

claim(address,address,uint256,uint256,ad.notice: Submit an IOU to claim the owed amount. If the deposit is smaller than the claim, the remaining deposit is claimed. If no tokens are claimed, `claim` may be retried, later.
